chunks.en: Claude 3.7 Sonnet is born! Hybrid reasoning crushes programming limits, AI coding king once again reigns supreme
### The world's first hybrid reasoning model Claude 3.7 Sonnet officially debuts!
Anthropic unleashes its trump card, integrating instant responsiveness with scalable thinking to completelyé¢ è¦† the boundaries of AI capabilities.

chunks.en: @kw8023cn #59 cursor is a revolution in programming and doesn't need advertising. If you still care about IDEs, it means your thinking is still in the era of handwriting code. It's not important what IDE you use when AI can automatically write code. If you don't believe it, then continue with your manual labor. By the time you wake up, you'll already be in the loser's bracket, just like Robin Li entered the loser's bracket, and now everything Baidu does is a dead end.

Claude 3.7 Sonnet has been updated and can be experienced at https://datapipe.app
Just saw that cursor can select 3.7, and the actual coding ability has been improved visibly.
Programming is dead
Keep bragging.

Can this kind of AI coding tool help to troubleshoot those legacy projects, such as pure business code that has been running for 10 or 20 years and is about to be refactored? Missing documentation. chunks.en: I tried it with the API in Anthropic's official workbench, and it's indeed strong at writing code. I had a problem with a UI component library that only gpt-4o and o1-preview could solve before (o3-mini, o1, R1 didn't work), but now claude 3.7 can also do it, and it does it the best. Other ordinary CS field problems, daily problems, didnâ€™t test obvious advantages, but programming is indeed good. Test record: https://echoccc.online/posts/llm-test
